The Drunkard forewarned and the swearer caution'd in a late judgement on the body of Dowee Sitses sent in a letter from Theodorus Paludamus ... to the Lady Habuerin : published for the information of some, and premonition to others, to lead a more pious life.
6 p.
Printed for William Sceates, London : 1682.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======

6 p.
Printed for William Sceates, London : 1682.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
